vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from Better Cities for Pets, for the Keeping People and Pets Together Program in the amount of $20,000.00, to be used to renovate the pavilion that is used as a multi-functional space for pets and potential adopters to meet during the grant period of January 17, 2022 through July 29, 2022; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the Better Cities for Pets January 2022 Keeping People and Pets Together Fund; and (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the Better Cities for Pets January 2022 Keeping People and Pets Together Fund - Not to exceed $20,000.00 - Financing: Better Cities for Pets Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from Better Cities for Pets, for the Keeping People and Pets Together Program in the amount of $20,000.00, to be used to renovate the pavilion that is used as a multi-functional space for pets and potential adopters to meet during the grant period of January 17, 2022 through July 29, 2022; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the Better Cities for Pets January 2022 Keeping People and Pets Together Fund; and (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $20,000.00 in the Better Cities for Pets January 2022 Keeping People and Pets Together Fund - Not to exceed $20,000.00 - Financing: Better Cities for Pets Grant Funds
